item.title: Internship at BetaCraft
item.description: Hello there. It has been time, since i have made an attempt to update my blog with the ongoing’s of my life. But now would be the right time probably. Alot have changed in some months, like i am now a 4th Year Final student at Jaypee University of Engineering and Technology(JUET), Guna. That’s pretty bad-ass bro. And as every engineer need to complete a mandatory training/internship at the end of the 3rd Year of B.
